original_text: He too prepared some tasty food and brought it to his father. Then he said to him, “My father, please sit up and eat some of my game, so that you may give me your blessing.”
korean_text: 그가 별미를 만들어 아버지에게로 가지고 가서 이르되 아버지여 일어나서 아들이 사냥한 고기를 잡수시고 마음껏 내게 축복하소서

sentences.original_text: He too prepared some tasty food
and brought it to his father
and eat some of my game
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 잡은 것을 좀 드세요

sentences.original_text: so that you may give me your blessing."
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신이 나에게 축복을 주실 것입니다."
